basics.name: Arun Kumar T K
basics.label: JavaScript developer
summary: I'm a passionate JavaScript developer with 4+ years of experience in development and product management.
I've co-founded a web startup called 'HedCET' during my college days,which went on to make some cool products in the intellectual property domain.
I completed my graduation in Electronics and Communication Engineering from the esteemed College of Engineering, Trivandrum .
When I'm not coding I like going through wikipedia articles and tech blogs; Tinkering with gadgets; Watching Atletico Madrid matches; Adding new books to my calibre library; Watching movies.

work.summary: Leading software development for the IP products initiative Clay-IP. My key responsibilites include leading the the front end development for all products, Product architecture and setting technological visions.
highlights: IP Dashboard : Designed and Developed the product. Developed using Meteor JS, Apollo, Graphql, Mongo DB, Polymer, D3, Echarts etc. Ongoing project.

IP-Analytics Tool : Next generation IP Analytics and Visualization tool. Developed using Meteor JS, Electron, Solr, ElasticSearch, Hadoop, Kafka, D3, MongoDB, Echarts, Polymer etc. Ongoing project. Leading the front end development.

Patent Data Accumulators : This tool Scrapes data from patent websites such as USPTO Public Pair, Espacenet, WIPO, Indian PTO etc, OCRs image files, dumps the data in a data warehouse. Developed using Meteor JS, Nightmare, Cheerio, MongoDB etc
LEAP : Internal Process management system and data store.
Patent Task Manager : App to manage patent related tasks. Led the frontend development works
Virtual Patent Marking Tool : Web app to mark patent to product mapping. Created the app
Proofreading Report Generation (PRG) : PRG is a proofreading workbench for paralegals. I led the development process. Developed using Meteor JS, Mongo DB,  React etc
Other Products : Patent Term Adjustment (PTA) Calculator, Patent Family Tree Generator etc.

work.summary: I've co-founded HedCET technologies pvt ltd in 2011 during my graduation days. In 2013 HedCET signed an agreement with clairvolex.inc and have since develped many IP products assisting various stages of patent prosecution and litigation.
highlights: Developed a mail client called TinyMail
Developed Beehive an ERP software for the schools and colleges.
